metadata.description: Signed: Jabineau de Santer. Blondel. Courtin. Treilhard. Gaultier du Breil
Regarding a legal dispute over the publication, by Jean Debure, of La Chapelle's Traité des sections coniques, et autres courbes anciennes and L'art de communiquer ses idées
metadata.notes: No copyright found. No table of contents found. Damaged, stained pages and cover. Title on cover.
